title: Ep48 Crazy Canadians
description: This week, the gals head to the Great White North to discuss some crazy Canadian crimes. Cases include a military man with a deadly fetish, a chocolate bar outrage, and a surprisingly intense maple syrup heist. So why doncha pick up a two-four 'a Labatt Blue for yer Molson muscle, count yer loonies (and toonies), kick back on yer chesterfield, and tune in for Crazy Canadians, eh?   This episode is supported by TalkSpace. Get $30 off your first month with promo code "GALS" www.talkspace.com/gals
